1:
You Israelite people, answer this question:\q1 What would have happened to us if Yahweh had not been helping us?
\q1
2:
When our enemies attacked us,\q1 if Yahweh had not been fighting for us,
\q1
3:
we would have all been killed\q2 because they were very angry with us!


\q1
4:
They would have been like a flood of water sweeping us away;\q1 it would have been as though the water had covered us,
\q2
5:
and we would all have drowned in the flood.


\q1
6:
But we praise Yahweh\q2 because he has not allowed our enemies to destroy us.
\q1
7:
We have escaped from our enemies as a bird escapes from the trap that hunters have set;\q1 it is as though the trap that our enemies set for us was broken
\q2 and we have escaped from it!


\q1
8: Yahweh is the one who helps us;\q2 he is the one who made heaven and the earth.
